subject: Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
American Pharoah (Race Horse)
Belmont Stakes
lead_paragraph: At a distance from the crowd and the pageantry, the rarely seen horse people at Belmont Park gathered to watch the historic run of American Pharoah on Saturday.
snippet: At a distance from the crowd and the pageantry, the rarely seen horse people at Belmont Park gathered to watch the historic run of American Pharoah on Saturday.
